website_summaries.verdict: This 10,700 BTU model is great for cooling small to mid-sized rooms and offers a combination of innovative features and a few frustrating quirks.
pros: Offers the brand's Real Feel technology that regulates temperature and humidity for a comfortable indoor environment
Puts out very cool air, and also works as a dehumidifier and fan

customer_reviews.title: Much noisier, heavier and less effective than expected. very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this item. Bought to aid sleep on hot nights as advertised as one of the quietest available. No chance of sleeping with this on in the room or even in an adjacent corridor. Cools the room it's in reasonably efficiently but not the adjacent room. I live in a small self contained two bedroom flat. If set at max cooling in the hallway it makes the hall cool enough but has little or no effect on the rooms. Be warned, this is also an extremely heavy item and very bulky, especially with the venting hose attached. Tried to return and got a flat refusal from Ryness Lighting & Eletrical
customer_reviews.author: Carpetman8020

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as it says
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because it had the lowest noise rating, but its a bit misleading. The lowest quoted noise rating is for fan only mode and at the lowest speed not in aircon mode. I think the detail description should explain the noise level better as im sure there are others looking to purchase based not only on the efficiency but how quiet it is.
customer_reviews.author: NAS user

customer_reviews.title: Cool, quiet, seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to bring the temperature of our bedroom down durning the Summer months. After 20 minutes at 19deg, the room feels cool and comfortable. Unlike a few other budget portable air conditioners this think is remarkably quiet! Not much louder than the fan when the compressor is running. My partner won’t sleep with the noise of a fan so unfortunately can’t leave it on all night. That said the temperature and just as important humidity reduction it brings will be a godsend if we get any more hot nights like we did in 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Humphreys-White

customer_reviews.title: Good solid unit
customer_reviews.text: Absolute lifesaver in this hot weather. No indoor air con is going to be quiet so noise levels aren’t bad when compared with some others. At night stick it on 30 minutes before bed and room is nice and cool. Can put on dehumidifier mode for a flow of quieter cool air. Remote range is bad, and it just works quirky, if you press the button but are out of range the remote display says one thing and the unit another. TBH remote is more trouble than its worth. Not having to empty the condensation tank it a great feature. Overall a good solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than other units we have had before.
customer_reviews.text: Quieter than other units we have had before. We can sleep with this on and our daughter who shares our room can also sleep with the noise. Cools the room quickly and controls are easy to use with a variety of options for setting your comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item: also noisy
customer_reviews.text: This portable air conditioning unit is not evaporating its condensed water and expelling it through the hot air piping (vented through an external window) It simply runs for 3-4 hours and then shuts down as its small internal water tank is full. I’m familiar with air con units and haven’t had this problem with other Delonghi units. Very very noisy also - beyond the usual fan and compressor noise: lots of high pitched whines and other sounds. I’ve owned several Delonghi units before and never had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A life saver in summer
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mobile air conditioner unit around, it have a lot off power and cools your space down fast, it’s is also one of the most quiet air conditioners on the market, I can transport it around easily too, a life saver in summer
customer_reviews.author: fai pang

customer_reviews.title: One of the best for a non-split unit air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I think people are expecting a silent air conditioner - these aren’t silent. They aren’t noisy either. I grew up in Hong Kong with a noisy air conditioner unit that was half in half out of the wall an it made a loud noise. It cools down the room and works well for an air conditioner that isn’t a split unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cools Down South Facing Room
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this air con unit, it cools down our living room which has been extended to around 30sq feet. We pop the hose out the window and it extracts all the moisture and heat from the air. It really does a great job in cooling down the room which is south facing
customer_reviews.author: S M Ianniello

customer_reviews.title: A very expensive fan!
customer_reviews.text: We researched and decided to buy this air con unit for our bedroom. It’s unbelievably noisy and doesn’t cool the room. It’s cold if you stand beside it but even if you could sleep through the noise (you definitely couldn’t) it doesn’t drop the room temperature. It’s effectively a very expensive fan
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions for the extractor pipexar3 not th3 clearest. Take your time so that you assemble the correct options. Other than that..., a brilliant piece of kit that does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: teddy cat

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but not too much more than a fan. Can have on full and go on conference calls.
customer_reviews.text: I use in small-ish attic room. Knocks about 5 deg Celsius off the room temp. The extraction hose could be a bit longer - I had to get an extender to vent out of a velux window 1.5m above the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not to impressed
customer_reviews.text: Thought it might have gone lower that 18 degrees and it’s 64 dB. So you can’t have it on in the bedroom. That’s the hole point of getting it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the quieter of the 2 I have. Works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service in delivery next day
customer_reviews.text: In hot weather it was excellent room was cool in seconds and it is not bulky right size
customer_reviews.author: suresh bala thapar

customer_reviews.title: OK but...
customer_reviews.text: OK but I wish you could get Midea ACs in the UK, their machines really work well (and do winter heating and cooling for the same price). Today, this has dropped the room from 27 to 24 degrees, the Midea I used in Korean summers dropped a larger room from it from 35 to 18/19 easily.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cool product does the job...
customer_reviews.text: This portable A/C is great at cooling down your average sized bedroom or living room. It's not the quietest and is a tad heavy, but once in position it certainly cools things down very nicely indeed and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Davie

customer_reviews.title: Down from 29c to 23c
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent . Took the temperature down from 29c to 23c , after a one hours use . I suppose if you left it on for two hours , it would bring the temperature down to 21c . [ has it set to 18c ] Once you switch it on , you can immediately fell the cold air being pumped out . You will not be disappointed in this product - Which is very simple to operate .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent machine
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this. Not sure if it's the best value but at the end of the day we can sleep through the fan and it cools our very large loft room.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Mrs Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: A cool room helps you sleep
customer_reviews.text: Could do with a longer hose and a bit quieter, but a dream to help you sleep! Any noise is better than a hot bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Gets a room cool quick
customer_reviews.text: The this product. Cooled our living room down so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Steffie/Mike

product_meta.title: Mini Air Conditioner, Portable Mini Cooler Upgrade Model, Air-Conditioner with USB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars96 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
